actions.text: Committee on Foreign Relations ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Percy. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules.
Committee on Rules. Committee consideration and Mark Up Session held.
Committee on Rules. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Rules. Reported to Senate by Senator Mathias without amendment. With written report No. 97-435.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 618.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: An original resolution authorizing the printing of "Background Information on the Committee on Foreign Relations, United States Senate" (5th revised edition), as a Senate document.

summary.text: Authorizes the printing of a compilation of materials entitled "Background Information on the Committee on Foreign Relations, United States Senate" as a Senate document. Authorizes additional printing of copies of such document for the use of that committee.

titles.title: An original resolution authorizing the printing of "Background Information on the Committee on Foreign Relations, United States Senate" (5th revised edition), as a Senate document.
